<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_include"> <sys_script_include action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"> <access>package_private</access> <active>true</active> <api_name>global.getSchemaAttributeColumnOnTable</api_name> <caller_access/> <client_callable>false</client_callable> <description>Reference qualifier to return all columns on a table</description> <name>getSchemaAttributeColumnOnTable</name> <script><![CDATA[function getSchemaAttributeColumnOnTable() { var query = 'internal_type!=collection'; if (current.on_table) query += '^name=' + current.on_table.name;
return query; }]]></script> <sys_class_name>sys_script_include</sys_class_name> <sys_created_by>maint</sys_created_by> <sys_created_on>2014-02-15 07:46:00</sys_created_on> <sys_id>2e18a957eb721100d4360c505206fed7</sys_id> <sys_mod_count>0</sys_mod_count> <sys_name>getSchemaAttributeColumnOnTable</sys_name> <sys_package display_value="Schema Attributes" source="com.glide.schema.attributes">ecad340b6d2220100acb70b35343306c</sys_package> <sys_policy/> <sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope> <sys_update_name>sys_script_include_2e18a957eb721100d4360c505206fed7</sys_update_name> <sys_updated_by>maint</sys_updated_by> <sys_updated_on>2014-02-15 07:46:00</sys_updated_on> <u_script_length>173</u_script_length> </sys_script_include> </record_update>
